data.name: SDL2SettingsWarning
data.value:
警告！ 更改驱动程序设置后，My Nes 可能无法启动。 如果发生这种情况，您需要在以下位置找到设置文件： 文档>MyNes>sdlsettings.ini，删除该文件，或修改该设置文件中的这一行：
"Video_Driver=opengl" 或 "Video_Driver=direct3d" 然后再试一次。 direct3d: 是 direct3d 驱动程序 opengl：是 opengl 驱动

data.name: GettingStartedNotes
data.value:
注意事项：
这些是默认的默认配置：
- 如果连接了 Xbox 控制器，它将自动分配：X 控制器玩家 1 为 nes 玩家 1，玩家 2 为 nes 玩家 2...玩家 4 为 nes 玩家 4。
- 如果分配了控制器，则断开连接，My Nes 将自动切换回键盘。
- 当您使用启动器启动游戏时，您希望启动器返回，按 F1/Esc 关闭仿真。 这应该会调出启动器对话框。
data.comment:
NOTES:
These are the default configurations by default:
- If a Xbox Controller is connected, it will be assigned automatically: X Controller player 1 for nes player 1, player 2 for nes player 2... player 4 for nes player 4.
- If a controller is assigned, then it is disconnected, My Nes will automatically switch back into keyboard.
- When you use the launcher to launch a game, then you want the launcher to return, press F1/Escape to shutdown the emulation. This should bring up the launcher dialog back.

data.name: Message45
data.value: 没有选择要删除的条目

data.value: 有问题，可能无法与此游戏一起使用。

data.name: GettingStartedDesc
data.value:
SlimdDX 和 SDL2 渲染器都可以通过 My Nes 产生最佳的视频/声音质量，每个渲染器都经过精心配置以获得最佳质量和性能。
* Slimdx 渲染器使用 Direct3d9 渲染视频，使用 DirectSound 渲染声音。
- 有时即使没有加载游戏，视频也会下降到 30 fps，这是与 Windows 相关的问题。 重新启动 My Nes 可能会解决此问题，但如果仍然存在，则别无选择，只能切换到 SDL2 视频。
- 有时 SlimDX 视频渲染器会让 My Nes 崩溃。 很抱歉这个错误，仍然不知道到底是什么问题......尽管仍在努力修复它，您需要做的就是重新启动 My Nes 并再次尝试运行游戏。
- 视频渲染器在低端电脑和笔记本电脑上运行缓慢。 经过测试，它可能至少需要 2400 Hz cpu 才能运行。 fps 下降将是诸如延迟问题、声音损坏、fps 不稳定等问题。
* SDL2 渲染器使用 SDL2 库进行渲染。 视频渲染器可以设置为 direct3d 或 opengl 驱动程序。
- 在低端电脑和笔记本电脑上运行没有速度问题。
- 在这些渲染器中没有发现问题，除了有时会出现声音故障，但它太小了，不应该打扰。
这些渲染器之间没有太大区别，因为渲染器实际上只是充当输出演示者。 您可能会注意到的唯一区别是性能，您需要仔细选择和配置 My Nes 才能在您的机器上顺利运行。
也可以混用渲染器，比如视频用SlimDX，声音用SDL2……渲染器可以随时从主菜单切换，注意更换渲染器需要重启 My Nes 才能生效。
默认情况下，My Nes 设置为使用 SlimDX 进行视频 (Direct3d9) 和声音 (DirectSound) 渲染。 经过测试，这是您可以从 My Nes 获得的最好结果。 如上所述，您需要仔细选择和配置 My Nes 才能在您的机器上顺利运行。 对于我测试的大多数机器，视频的 SDL2 和声音的 SlimDX (DirectSound) 是质量和性能的最佳选择。
警告！
My Nes 可能无法使用 SDL2 视频渲染器启动。 如果发生这种情况，您需要在以下位置找到设置文件：
文档>MyNes>sdlsettings.ini
打开该文件，然后编辑该行： "Video_Driver=opengl”或“Video_Driver=direct3d”然后再试一次。 direct3d: 是 direct3d 驱动程序 opengl：是 opengl 驱动
如果两个驱动程序都不起作用，则别无选择，只能切换到 SlimDX 视频渲染器。
data.comment:
Both renderers, SlimdDX and SDL2 Produce the best video/sound quality possible with My Nes, each renderer is carefully configured for best quality and performance.
* Slimdx renderers render using Direct3d9 for video and DirectSound for sound.
- Sometimes the video drops into 30 fps even though there is no game loaded, this is a windows related issue. Restarting My Nes may fix this problem, but If it remains, there is no choice but to switch into SDL2 Video.
- Sometimes SlimDX video renderer makes My Nes craches. Sorry for this bug, still have no idea what's the problem excatly... still working on fixing it though, all you need to do is to restart My Nes and try again to run the game.
- Video renderer run slow on low-end pcs and laptops. After tests, it needs at least 2400 Hz cpu to function probably. The fps drop will be something like latency issues, sound corruption, fps unstability... etc.
* SDL2 renderers render using SDL2 library. The video renderer can be set to direct3d or opengl driver.
- Run with no speed issues on low-end pcs and laptops.
- No issues found in these renderer except sometimes sound glitches but it's so little that should not bother.
There is no big difference between these renderers, since renderers in fact just act as outputs presenters. The only difference you may notice is with performance, you need to carefully choose and configure My Nes to run smoothly in your machine.
Also you can mix renderers, for example, you can use SlimDX for video and SDL2 for sound... Renderers can be switched anytime from the main menu, note that changing a renderer requires My Nes to restart to take effect.
As default, My Nes is set to use SlimDX for video (Direct3d9) and sound (DirectSound) rendering. After tests, this is the best you can get from My Nes. As above, you need to carefully choose and configure My Nes to run smoothly in your machine. For most machines i test, SDL2 for video and SlimDX (DirectSound) for sound is the best choice for both quality and performance.
WARNING!
My Nes may fail to launch with SDL2 video renderer. If that happens, you need to locate the settings file in:
Documents>MyNes>sdlsettings.ini
Open that file then edit the line: "Video_Driver=opengl" or "Video_Driver=direct3d" then try again. direct3d: is the direct3d driver opengl: is the opengl driver
If both drivers doesn't work, there is no choice but to switch into SlimDX video renderer.
